item.title: Orphaned case with npc dialogue
item.dc:creator: @xx_qwertyuiop_xx xx qwertyuiop xx
item.description:
@xx_qwertyuiop_xx wrote:

Orphaned case means that your case is outside of a switch statement. Look for any brackets that may be closing the switch statement.

Read full topic

item.title: Orphaned case with npc dialogue
item.dc:creator: @si_force Si Force
item.description:
@si_force wrote:

Hi guys,

I’ve recently being adding npc dialogue to my server and i keep getting this error :

[code]client.java:31182: Orphaned Case
Case 28:
^

1 error[/code]

I havn’t one clue what the problem is,
Heres the code i have added in :

case 28: sendFrame200(4883, 591); sendFrame126(GetNpcName(NpcTalkTo), 4884); sendFrame126("Hello and welcome to CastleWars.", 4885); sendFrame75(NpcTalkTo, 4883); sendFrame164(4882); NpcDialogueSend = true; break;

case 29: sendFrame200(4883, 591); sendFrame126(GetNpcName(NpcTalkTo), 4884); sendFrame126("I will teach you the various tricks involved.", 4885); sendFrame75(NpcTalkTo, 4883); sendFrame164(4882); NpcDialogueSend = true; break;

Read full topic
